result.execSummary:
The defendant Donald Thomas Fravert was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Donald Thomas Fravert is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Donald Thomas Fravert was found guilty of Failure to Support Child (120 Days+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Sentence w/held probation 3 years consecutive to any sentence now serving- costs $518.00 - to pay child support in full and on time as ordered plus an add'l $100.00 per month towards arrears - to contact DOC 24 hours after released from custody or if on a weekend 1st business day after being released -  Counts 2 and 3 are dismissed.
Consecutive to: to any other sentence currently serving

miscConds.notes: Costs $268.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Donald Thomas Fravert in court with attorney Paul Max Moldenhauer.  Defendant Donald Thomas Fravert in custody.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE entered plea of NC.    DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  Court finds defendant guilty count 1.

COURT:  Sentence w/held probation 3 years consecutive to any sentence now serving- costs $518.00 - to pay child support in full and on time as ordered plus an add'l $100.00 per month towards arrears - to contact DOC 24 hours after released from custody or if on a weekend 1st business day after being released -  Counts 2 and 3 are dismissed.

Defendant Donald Thomas Fravert in court with attorney Paul Max Moldenhauer.  Defendant Donald Thomas Fravert in custody.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE wishes to waive preliminary exam.  Court finds defendant has freely waived his right to a prelim - finds probable cause and binds defendant over for trial.  Atty Moldenhauer acknowleded reciept of information
Preliminary hearing on July 8, 2016 at 09:00 am.
from Attorney Moldenhauer requesting preliminary hearing and return on warrant on behalf of his client.
FROM DEF on jail request to cancel warrant - CC DA, Def Counsel and Judge
Received signed bond via mail from DE in Taylor County Jail

DEF did not appear. Atty Paul Max Moldenhauer appeared.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Moldenhauer: based on outside information, DEF may be in Barron county jail.
States requests warrant.
Court: warrant granted.
In the Natur of Writ of Error Coram Nobis Non-corporate entity & a demand for dismissal or state the proper jurisdiction

Defendant Donald Thomas Fravert in court with attorney James C. McLaughlin.  Defendant Donald Thomas Fravert in custody Taylor County Jail, appeared by video.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Warrant quashed.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  SIBS $1000  No Special Conditons.  Bond to be sent for signature.  DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 16, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
